did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Correspondence, manuscripts, architectural plans (reproductions), and photographs.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: Janes, Fowler, Kirtland & Co. did metal work for the dome of the U.S. capitol in Washington, D.C., designed by the architect Thomas Ustick Walter.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Letters to Janes, Fowler, Kirtland & Co. concerning construction of the capitol dome; reproductions of drawings and photograph of dome; carbon typescript "From THE NATIONAL CAPITOL".

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Janes, Fowler, Kirtland & Co. Records, #3244. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Collections consists of a single box. Online guide unavailable.
